bibl.title: Report on the Eighth Season of the Joint Swiss-Egyptian Mission in Syene / Old Aswan (2007/2008).
bibl.note: 1. Area 2: Cleaning of the eastern part of the central archaeological area of Aswan. - 2. Area 32: Final investigations. - 3. Area 34: Mamluk and Early Islamic town quarter and Roman tombs. - 4. Area 35: Domestic quarter of the Ottoman period. - 5. Area 36: Roman and Persian building structures. - 6. Area 37: The Suq Street from the beginnings of Islamic Aswan to the present. - 7. Area 39: The city wall of Syene. - 8. Area 40A: Early Islamic to Mamluk street on top of a Roman elite burial. - 9. Area 41: The fortification wall between Aswan and Shellal. - 10. Area 42: Ottoman and Mamluk structures at the eastern edge of the town. - 11. Area 43: Late Ptolemaic town quarter. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Annales du Service des antiquités d'Égypte

bibl.seg: Cornelius von Pilgrim & Wolfgang Müller, Report on the Eighth Season of the Joint Swiss-Egyptian Mission in Syene / Old Aswan (2007/2008).

1. Area 2: Cleaning of the eastern part of the central archaeological area of Aswan. - 2. Area 32: Final investigations. - 3. Area 34: Mamluk and Early Islamic town quarter and Roman tombs. - 4. Area 35: Domestic quarter of the Ottoman period. - 5. Area 36: Roman and Persian building structures. - 6. Area 37: The Suq Street from the beginnings of Islamic Aswan to the present. - 7. Area 39: The city wall of Syene. - 8. Area 40A: Early Islamic to Mamluk street on top of a Roman elite burial. - 9. Area 41: The fortification wall between Aswan and Shellal. - 10. Area 42: Ottoman and Mamluk structures at the eastern edge of the town. - 11. Area 43: Late Ptolemaic town quarter. - Avec résumé en anglais.
